This notebook follows along with the following video:

[R - Classification Trees (part 1 using C5.0)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5NquIfQxpxk&list=PLjPbBibKHH18I0mDb_H4uP3egypHIsvMn&index=24)

First we install the `C50` package:

```{r eval=FALSE}
install.packages("C50")
```

```{r}
library("C50")
data(iris)
```

```{r}
head(iris)
```

```{r}
str(iris)
```

```{r}
table(iris$Species)
```

```{r}
set.seed(9850)
g <- runif(nrow(iris))
irisr <- iris[order(g),]
```

```{r}
str(irisr)
```

```{r}
m1 <- C5.0(irisr[1:100, -5],irisr[1:100,5])
m1
```

```{r}
summary(m1)
```

```{r}
p1 <- predict(m1, irisr[101:150,]) 
p1
```

```{r}
table(irisr[101:150,5], Predicted=p1)
```

```{r}
plot(m1)
```
